about_the_game:
Lust For Lucre is a fantasy-themed match-3 dating sim that combines monster strip battles and dungeon exploration into one saucy adventure. Step into a world where your lust for power and riches is rivaled only by your desire for romance and conquest.

Key Features:
  • Strip Battles: Strip every monster you come across! Watch as their armor and clothing fall off piece by piece.
  • Dungeon Battler: Delve into daring dungeons and collect a huge array of unique loot.


  • Dating Sim: Romance the 14 Damsels, earn their tokens of affection, and collect their lust!

  • Lust and Lucre: Your lust serves as your experience, allowing you to upgrade your stats, enhance your abilities, and perform better in dates and battles. Earn lucre to buy, sell, and trade items that will aid you on your journey.
  • Full Nudity and Romance Scenes: Indulge in explicit romance scenes that bring your fantasies to life. The game features full nudity.



Gameplay Overview:
In Lust For Lucre, your adventure begins in the land of Uberia, a fantasy world where romance and danger are around every corner. As you progress, you'll meet a diverse cast of characters, each with their own stories and secrets. Master the match-3 gameplay to win the hearts of the damsels and defeat the monstrous adversaries that stand in your way.

Use your earned lucre to acquire powerful items and enhance your arsenal. Your lust for power and affection drives your progression, shaping you into the ultimate romantic hero.

Whether you are wooing a damsel or vanquishing a monster, every action you take in Lust For Lucre will bring you closer to becoming the most renowned lover and adventurer in the realm.

Are you ready to satisfy your Lust For Lucre and embark on the ultimate quest for love, riches, and glory?
